header.title: IdeaBase.ai
header.subtitle: Discover startup opportunities from GitHub trending projects

project.error: Failed to fetch projects, please try again later
project.loadLimitTip: For performance optimization, we limit the display to 100 records. Please use the search function to find specific projects.
project.searchTip: Please use the search and filter functions above to precisely find projects you're interested in.

analysis.errorRetry: You can try again later or contact our support team.
analysis.technicalIssue: We encountered technical issues analyzing this project. You can still view partial content or try again later.

footer.copyright: IdeaBase.ai. Ideas are not the most important thing, but having no ideas is absolutely not acceptable.
footer.dailyAnalysis: Daily analysis of GitHub trending projects to discover entrepreneurial opportunities.

api.title: IdeaBase.ai API
api.documentDescription: IdeaBase.ai REST API provides access to GitHub trending project data and AI analysis results

getProjects.name: Get Trending Projects List
getProjects.description: Get a list of all GitHub trending projects

getProject.name: Get Project Details by owner/repo
getProject.description: Get project details by GitHub username and repository name

getInsights.name: Get Project Analysis by owner/repo
getInsights.description: Get AI analysis results for a project by GitHub username and repository name

getLanguages.name: Get Trending Languages List
getLanguages.description: Get a list of all programming languages from GitHub trending projects

adminScrape.name: Trigger Manual Scraping
adminScrape.description: Manually trigger GitHub trending projects scraping (requires admin privileges)

parameters.insightLanguage: Language for insight content, defaults to English
